statements: SELECT * FROM claims_data;
SELECT claim_id, policy_holder FROM claims_data ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM claims_data WHERE claim_amount > 5000;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, policy_holder FROM claims_data WHERE policy_holder = 'Alice';
SELECT AVG(claim_amount) AS avg_claim_amount FROM claims_data;
SELECT * FROM claims_data WHERE claim_amount > 1000 ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, policy_holder FROM claims_data WHERE policy_holder LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY claim_amount ASC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_amount FROM claims_data WHERE claim_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 2000;
SELECT policy_holder, SUM(claim_amount) AS total_claim_amount FROM claims_data GROUP BY policy_holder ORDER BY total_claim_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM claims_data WHERE policy_holder = 'John Doe' AND claim_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY claim_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM claims_data;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_amount FROM claims_data WHERE policy_holder = 'John Doe';
SELECT policy_holder, SUM(claim_amount) AS total_claim_amount FROM claims_data GROUP BY policy_holder;
SELECT * FROM fraud_detection WHERE fraud_status = 'Under Investigation' ORDER BY fraud_id DESC;
SELECT provider_name, COUNT(*) AS total_claims FROM claims_data GROUP BY provider_name HAVING total_claims > 1;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_amount, policy_holder, provider_name FROM claims_data;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount, policy_holder, provider_name, claim_date FROM claims_data ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount FROM claims_data WHERE claim_amount > 5000;
SELECT claim_id, provider_name, fraud_status, fraud_description FROM claims_data INNER JOIN fraud_detection ON claims_data.claim_id = fraud_detection.claim_id;
SELECT fraud_id, fraud_status, investigator_name FROM fraud_detection WHERE fraud_status = 'Suspicious';
SELECT * FROM claims_data ORDER BY claim_id DESC;
SELECT claim_amount, claim_date FROM claims_data WHERE claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM policy_holders WHERE phone_number LIKE '%1234%';
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM providers WHERE rating > 4.5 ORDER BY provider_name;
SELECT policy_holder_id, full_name, date_of_birth FROM policy_holders WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM claims_data ORDER BY claim_date DESC, claim_amount ASC;
SELECT policy_holder_id, full_name, date_of_birth FROM policy_holders WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT provider_name, specialty, location, rating FROM providers WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount, diagnosis_code FROM claims_data WHERE diagnosis_code LIKE 'A%' AND claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT provider_name, specialty, location FROM providers WHERE location = 'New York' OR location = 'California' ORDER BY specialty, provider_name;
SELECT * FROM members;
SELECT member_name, member_dob FROM members WHERE member_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT provider_name, provider_specialty FROM providers ORDER BY provider_name ASC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_status FROM claims WHERE claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_amount < 500;
SELECT * FROM claims;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount, claim_status FROM claims WHERE claim_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT member_id, member_name, member_dob FROM members ORDER BY member_name DESC;
SELECT provider_name, provider_specialty FROM providers WHERE provider_location = 'New York';

SELECT claim_id, member_name, payment_amount FROM claims JOIN members ON claims.claim_id = members.member_id JOIN payments ON claims.claim_id = payments.claim_id WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM claimants;
SELECT claim_id, claim_type, claim_amount FROM claims_data WHERE claim_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT provider_name, provider_location FROM providers ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date FROM claims_data WHERE claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT detection_id, claim_id, detection_date, detection_result FROM fraud_detection WHERE detection_result = 'Fraud';
SELECT * FROM claims_data WHERE claim_type = 'Medical';
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_type, claim_amount FROM claims_data ORDER BY claim_amount DESC;
SELECT claimant_id, claimant_name, claimant_address FROM claimants WHERE claimant_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT provider_name, provider_specialty, provider_location FROM providers WHERE provider_specialty = 'Dental' ORDER BY provider_name ASC;
SELECT claim_id, payment_date, payment_amount FROM payments WHERE payment_amount > 5000;
